title: Sportshort. No. 2. Denis Compton
creator_credit: Douglas Rankin, Adrian Reid and Exclusive Films
brief_description: A record of the life and accomplishments of Denis Compton, one of the greatest figures in English sporting history. In addition to showing his cricket strokes and some of his memorable performances at the wicket, the film illustrates his training methods and also his ability in other sports, including soccer, golf, and tennis.
